name: phonebook_backend
description: first backend acording to fullstack open course

scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd ../../fso-part2/phonebook/ && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item dist -Recurse ../../fso-part3/phonebook_backend
scripts.deploy:full: git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Artem Matviienko
